WELCOME.title: Welcome to Catena-X!
WELCOME.content: Welcome to the Catena- X Network. To easily get you onboarded, a number of notifications / onboarding steps have been defined. Please check your notifications and start the configuration of your company area inside the portal to have a network experience based on your need.

WELCOME_USE_CASES.title: Browse common Use Cases
WELCOME_USE_CASES.content: The network is quite huge, we want to ensure that you can focus on your preferred use cases. Select your preferred use case from the table below.....

WELCOME_SERVICE_PROVIDER.title: Service Providers are waiting for you
WELCOME_SERVICE_PROVIDER.content: If you need a service provider to help you with setting up your dataspace or an EDC, just follow us to the Service Provider Marketplace.

WELCOME_CONNECTOR_REGISTRATION.title: Register a Connector
WELCOME_CONNECTOR_REGISTRATION.content: You do not have any registered Connector so far â€“ have a look at the connector offers and get your connector to participate.

WELCOME_APP_MARKETPLACE.title: Check out the App Marketplace
WELCOME_APP_MARKETPLACE.content: Get a first insight into available apps, just follow us to the app marketplace.

APP_SUBSCRIPTION_REQUEST.title: App {{app}}: Subscription Request
APP_SUBSCRIPTION_REQUEST.content: A new app subscription request was triggered by {{company}}. Get in contact with {{useremail}} to agree on the app usage and setup guidelines. As soon as this is done, you can activate the app for {{company}}

APP_SUBSCRIPTION_ACTIVATION.title: Congratulations! - {{offer}} is activated
APP_SUBSCRIPTION_ACTIVATION.content: Congratulations! Your access to your subscribed app {{offer}} have got activated. You are now ready to start using the app. Before accessing the app directly; please got to the user management and assign app roles to the respective users. Only users with an assigned role can access the application.

CONNECTOR_REGISTERED.title: Connector registered successfully
CONNECTOR_REGISTERED.content: The connector {{connector}} was successfully created and you can assign users now.

APP_RELEASE_REQUEST.title: App Release Request - App: {{offer}}
APP_RELEASE_REQUEST.content: {{company}} created a new app to get published to the catena-x marketplace. Please review the app release request and approve or decline the request.

APP_RELEASE_APPROVAL.title: App request approved
APP_RELEASE_APPROVAL.content: Your request for app {{app}} was successfully approved. You can now start to assign user permissions via the user management panel.

APP_RELEASE_REJECTION.title: App Release request rejected
APP_RELEASE_REJECTION.content: Your request for app {{offer}} got rejected. We regret to inform you that your app release request has been rejected. We take great pride in the quality of our apps and the user experience that they provide. Although your app has a lot of potential, it does not meet our standards for marketplace release. With the appropriate changes, your app can reach the level of quality that meets our standards. If you need support, please don't esitate to reach out for support. We look forward to seeing your app reach its full potential and be released. Sincerely, Catena-X.

APP_ROLE_ADDED.title: App {{app}} new Roles added
APP_ROLE_ADDED.content: New user roles have been added for the app {{app}} which you can now assign. New Roles: {{roles}}

TECHNICAL_USER_CREATION.title: {{appName}} subscription created a new technical user
TECHNICAL_USER_CREATION.content: This is a default text and will get enhanced later.

SERVICE_RELEASE_REQUEST.title: Service Release Request - Service: {{offer}}
SERVICE_RELEASE_REQUEST.content: {{company}} created a new service to get published to the catena-x marketplace. Please review the service release request and approve or decline the service release.

SERVICE_RELEASE_APPROVAL.title: Service release request approved
SERVICE_RELEASE_APPROVAL.content: Your release request for service offer {{serviceName}} was successfully approved and available on the service marketplace.

SERVICE_RELEASE_REJECTION.title: Service release request rejected
SERVICE_RELEASE_REJECTION.content: Your request for service offer {{serviceName}} got declined. Please recheck your service management board and solve the findings: {{personalMessage}}.

SERVICE_REQUEST.title: Service Subscription Request - Service: {{app}}
SERVICE_REQUEST.content: {{company}} triggered a subscription request for service {{app}}. Validate the request details on the subscription board.

SERVICE_ACTIVATION.title: Service request activated
SERVICE_ACTIVATION.content: Your subscription for service offer {{serviceName}} is now active

ROLE_UPDATE_CORE_OFFER.title: Assigned User Roles Updated - Portal

ROLE_UPDATE_APP_OFFER.title: Assigned User Roles Updated - {{app}}

CREDENTIAL_APPROVAL.title: Verified Credential {{credentialType}} assigned
CREDENTIAL_APPROVAL.content: Verified Credential {{credentialType}} got assigned to your company wallet.

CREDENTIAL_REJECTED.title: Verified Credential {{credentialType}} declined
CREDENTIAL_REJECTED.content: Verified Credential {{credentialType}} got declined. You can start a new request immediately.

SUBSCRIPTION_URL_UPDATE.title: App URL {{app}} updated
SUBSCRIPTION_URL_UPDATE.content:
The app provider has changed the stored App Instance URL for your subscribed app {{app}}.

New URL: {{newUrl}}

deleteModal.title: Delete Notification
deleteModal.intro: Do you want to delete this notification? The deletion is not reversible.

ALL.title: All notifications
ALL.description: Messaged for required action from your side

INFO.title: Info notifications
INFO.description: Changes of assigned roles or newly created tech users

OFFER.title: App notifications
OFFER.description: App publish notifications, request, activations, etc.

header.title: Notifications
header.subtitle: Here you will receive relevant news about Catena-X, published apps and services and the apps and services you use. In addition, changes to your user account, e.g. newly assigned or revoked roles.
